## blockRendering.Renderer.makeDrawer\_() method

Create a new instance of the renderer's drawer.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
protected makeDrawer_(block: BlockSvg, info: RenderInfo): Drawer;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  block | [BlockSvg](./blockly.blocksvg_class.md) | The block to render. |
|  info | [RenderInfo](./blockly.blockrendering_namespace.renderinfo_class.md) | An object containing all information needed to render this block. |

[Drawer](./blockly.blockrendering_namespace.drawer_class.md)
